scripts.iife: mkdir -p iife && rollup -f iife -n cssobj_plugin_value_default_unit src/cssobj-plugin-value-default-unit.js -o iife/cssobj-plugin-value-default-unit.js && uglifyjs iife/cssobj-plugin-value-default-unit.js -cm -o iife/cssobj-plugin-value-default-unit.min.js
scripts.amd: mkdir -p amd && rollup -f amd -u cssobj_plugin_value_default_unit src/cssobj-plugin-value-default-unit.js -o amd/cssobj-plugin-value-default-unit.js
scripts.cjs: mkdir -p cjs && rollup -f cjs src/cssobj-plugin-value-default-unit.js -o cjs/cssobj-plugin-value-default-unit.js
scripts.es: mkdir -p es && rollup -f es src/cssobj-plugin-value-default-unit.js -o es/cssobj-plugin-value-default-unit.js
scripts.make: npm run iife && npm run cjs && npm run amd && npm run es
